sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Deletes Actionable Prompt demo record.</description>
        <name>Remove Actionable Prompt Demo Record</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[removeActionablePromptDemoRecord();

function removeActionablePromptDemoRecord() {
	if (pm.isZboot())
		return;

	var rec = new GlideRecord('sys_notification_actionable_prompt');
	if(rec.get("08aa5da30f0210105605539ac4767e8c")) {
		rec.deleteRecord();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-08-23 16:34:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>966e7cd35b023010342600263381c789</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove Actionable Prompt Demo Record</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Notification Providers" source="com.glide.notification.provider">e5887ca03cf1311068bcf327dfe37f57</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_966e7cd35b023010342600263381c789</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-08-23 16:34:53</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
